description: Send us your questions about the sale of stakes in the eight teams in The Hundred.
title: The Hundred investment: Ask Test Match Special your questions
title_page: The Hundred investment: Ask Test Match Special your questions - BBC Sport
maintext:
In a landmark move for English cricket, stakes in each of the eight teams in The Hundred are being sold.
It has been a lengthy process, with investors from the Indian Premier League and United States, among others, winning the right to buy part of the game in this country.
The Test Match Special Podcast will attempt to answer any questions you have about the sales.
What is being sold and why? Where will the money go? What will change?
Put your questions to BBC Sport below and the best ones will be answered on the TMS Podcast.
